content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore Pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position -11.5, 26.5)

### Steam Engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Pipe connections to the Offshore Pump and Boiler

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles at positions:
  - (-16.5, 19.5)
  - (-16.5, 18.5)
  - (-16.5, 21.5)
  - (-16.5, 20.5)
  - (-19.5, 22.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Assembling Machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling Machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

### Copper Plate Mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) and Burner Mining Drill (position not specified)

### Pipe Groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple Pipe Groups connecting various entities and fluids.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the Offshore Pump and Steam Engine are within a valid range for pipe connections. Check the distance and alignment before attempting to connect.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure all power-consuming entities are connected to a power network. Check the placement of electric poles to ensure they cover the necessary areas.
